en.content: You draw close to the man. He glares over his shoulder and sees you. “Damn you,” he spits, and slows down. “Can’t you leave a fellow be?”
You assure him you mean him no harm.
“We can’t talk here,” he says. “Follow me.”

zh.content: 你逐渐靠近那个男人。他回头怒视着你。“你这混账，”他啐道，放慢了脚步。“你能离开我吗？”
你向他保证自己对他没有恶意。
他说：“我们不能在这里说话。跟我来。”
